title: Frisée Salad with Cucumber and Radishes
directions: Toss cucumber with vinegar, oil, salt, and pepper in a large bowl. Let stand 10 minutes.
Add frisée, watercress, spinach, and radishes and toss well.
ingredients: 1/2 seedless cucumber (usually plastic-wrapped), peeled, halved lengthwise, cored, and thinly sliced diagonally (2 cups)
2 oounces frisée, trimmed (3 cups loosely packed)
1 bunch watercress, trimmed and tough stems discarded (3 cups loosely packed)
2 oz baby spinach (2 cups loosely packed)
6 radishes, sliced, then cut into matchsticks
